body_html:
I have pushed changes to the retrain.py script to support these, once the next sync happens.

Commands like

python tensorflow/examples/image_retraining/retrain.py \
    --image_dir ~/flower_photos/   --architecture mobilenet_1.0_224_quant

should work for all depth multipliers and image sizes.

Please create a new issue if things don't work once github pulls in the changes to retrain.py
body_text:

should work for all depth multipliers and image sizes.
Please create a new issue if things don't work once github pulls in the changes to retrain.py
body:
I have pushed changes to the retrain.py script to support these, once the next sync happens.

Commands like
```
python tensorflow/examples/image_retraining/retrain.py \
    --image_dir ~/flower_photos/   --architecture mobilenet_1.0_224_quant
```
should work for all depth multipliers and image sizes.

Please create a new issue if things don't work once github pulls in the changes to retrain.py
